text: María Victoria Ledesma Cuevas (30 May 1931 - 1 August 2022), known by her stage name Rosa de Castilla (), was a Mexican singer and actress.Mexican Film Performers--"C", retrieved October 29, 2010. She was known as one of the great folkloric leading ladies of the "golden age" of Mexican cinema. She was born in Encarnación de Díaz, Jalisco. Her best known roles were in Yo... el aventurero (1959), Dos corazones y un cielo (1959), and Héroe a la fuerza (1964). Her career began in 1952. Castilla died on 1 August 2022 at the age of 91.Fallece la actriz del cine de oro Rosa de Castilla ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican singers Category:People from Jalisco
title: Rosa de Castilla
